LanguageData.FALCHM.OverlayOpacityDesc: Reduce this value to make the overlay more transparent.
LanguageData.FALCHM.UpdateDelayDesc: Number of ticks delay between overlay updates while game is unpaused. Lower numbers provide smoother updates, but may affect performance on low end machines.
LanguageData.FALCHM.ShowOutDoorThermometerDesc: Displays a widget in the top right hand corner of the UI showing current outdoor temperature.
LanguageData.FALCHM.ThermometerOpacityDesc: Reduce this value to make the outdoor temperature thermometer background color more transparent.
LanguageData.FALCHM.ThermometerTooltip: Outdoor temperature. Click to toggle heat map overlay. This widget can be disabled in Mod Settings.
